column4: Hello. I have a problem when trying to boot X server on installation CD in Gutsy. Blank screen always, X fails to start. Ati Radeon x1550. VESA driver, any ideas, how I can start installer?
could you please try pressing Cntrl-Alt-F1 and typing "sudo /etc/init.d/gdm start" and giving us some feedback on what that gives you ?
I tried but X start fails
